name: MicroservicesApi
description: Collection to test API responses in application Microservices Booking

folders.name: Endpoint users
folders.description:
Endpoint used to perform actions on users data.
From this endpoint you can create, edit and delete users. You can also get users list and get details about user.

requests.name: DELETE users:login
requests.description: Endpoint used to remove selected user.

requests.name: GET users unauthorized
requests.description: Request should return list of avaliable users.

requests.name: POST authenticate
requests.description: Endpoint used to login to application and recieve token.

requests.name: GET users when deleted
requests.description: Request should return list of avaliable users.

requests.name: POST users
requests.description: Endpoint used to create new user.

requests.description: Endpoint used to login to application and recieve token.

requests.description: Endpoint used to create new user.
